activities: Littelfuse receives associate Personal Information in connection with the management and administration of pre-employment, employment, and post-employment matters.
eucountries: France, Germany, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Associate employment information that can be systematically or manually processed.
recoursemech: Littelfuse investigates any dispute raised by an EU based associates regarding the use of Personal Information. If the dispute cannot be resolved, Littelfuse will participate in the dispute resolution procedures established by the local European Union data protection authorities (DPAs).
